string-array.name: bug_catcher_dialogue_array
string-array.item: I\'m only in this to catch a land eel!
Does anyone see my bug catching net?
There\'s an aroma wafting off our leader...

resources.string: Congratulations! You beat our 5 contest trainers! You just earned a fabulous prize! [Player] received a NUGGET! By the way, would you like to join TEAM ROCKET? We\'re a group dedicated to evil using POKEMON! Want to join? Are you sure? Come on, join us! I\'m telling you to join! OK, you need convincing! I\'ll make you an offer you can\'t refuse! \n\nWith your ability, you could become a top leader in TEAM ROCKET!

Hello there! Welcome to the world of JAVA! My name is FOO BAR! People call me the JAVA PROF! This world is inhabited by creatures called OBJECT! For some people, OBJECT are pets. Others use them for fights. Myself... I study OBJECT as a profession. First, what is your name?
This is my grandson. He\'s been your rival since you were a baby. ...Erm, what is his name again?
That\'s right! I remember now! His name is %s!
Your very own JAVA legend is about to unfold! A world of dreams and adventure with OBJECT awaits! Let\'s go!

string-array.name: seed_shop_dialogue_array
string-array.item: Hello! I was cleaning out my father\'s belongings when I found these mystery seeds. I can\'t keep a cactus alive. You have a green thumb, how about you grow these seeds for me? If you get me 3 mystery products, I\'ll give you some coins! Also, you can keep the shovel, watering can, and mystery seeds!
Hello! Please germinate and grow the mystery seeds, then harvest 3 mystery products and place them in the shipping bin.
Hello! The mystery products you\'ve harvested were FAR out. Like OUTER-SPACE far. You can probably bring about world peace with what you\'re growing.

string-array.name: clippit_dialogue_array
string-array.item: It looks like you\'re trying to bring about world peace. Would you like some help?
We\'re going to get the entire world stoned for a week! We\'ll need a lot of mystery product. Start by tilling 4,200 GrowableTile.
Tilling 4,200 GrowableTile with a shovel will take all day. Fortunately, there\'s a rust-bucket robot that is software-upgradeable. It\'s time to work smarter (not harder)!

We\'re the first to finish, but now we have to wait for everyone else. Instead of wasting time doing nothing, how about we learn the basics of modifying genes? Then we can splice the gene responsible for THC production into the genome of the world\'s fastest growing organism.

Alright! You\'ve created THC-producing-kelp, and you\'re one step closer to getting the entire world stoned for a week. Let\'s go on a side quest to deposit the mystery seeds into the world\'s seed bank.
You\'ve been recruited to a team who are on a mission to terraform the moon. It\'s time to create some moonrocks!
This is it, the final run. The Panthers are wrecking havoc and keeping law enforcement busy. You got Molly in your ears with Mary as your tracer. Welcome to Straylight.
